summary: Implements a diffusion pipeline that combines Stable Diffusion 3 with ControlNet for image inpainting, handling preprocessing of images, masks, and control signals, integrating text and image encoders, applying LoRA scaling, and orchestrating the denoising scheduler to generate edited images.
business_intent: Enable developers and content creators to perform text‑guided image editing and inpainting with fine‑grained control, leveraging the latest SD3 model and ControlNet extensions for high‑quality, customizable image generation.
